lines.text: Draw rays using law of reflection
Find image location with virtual rays

secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:actsec_t554:Experiment] with curved mirrors to observe how an object and image appear.
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_t555:reflection].
3. Define [OBJ:expsec_t556:specular and diffuse reflection].
4. Describe [OBJ:expsec_t557:plane mirror, object, and image].
5. Define [OBJ:expsec_t558:virtual and real images].
6. Apply the concept of virtual and real images to [OBJ:pwsec_t559:optical illusions].
7. Define [OBJ:expsec_t560:light rays].
8. Define and calculate the angle of incidence and angle of reflection using the [OBJ:expsec_t561:law of reflection].
9. Draw a [OBJ:expsec_t563:ray diagram].
10. [OBJ:actsec_t569:Experiment] with ray diagrams using a convex mirror.
